teams.name: Wholesale Furniture Brokers
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference and believe in the fundamentals of entrepreneurship and micro-finance.  Help people help themselves with a sustainable strategy.
teams.description: Every week, WFB announces a Weekly Warrior; someone who goes above and beyond the call of duty.  From now on, we will award each Weekly Warrior funds to their Kiva account which they can allocate as part of WFB's Kiva Team.
